response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its value and importance, I propose a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a discount. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
